content: I cannot predict the future with certainty. however, i can say that cnn's use of virtual reality in news reporting has received positive feedback from audiences and has been recognized in the industry. its use of this technology has enabled the network to provide a more immersive experience, which is especially appealing to younger audiences. due to these benefits, it is possible that other news networks may soon follow in cnn's footsteps and incorporate virtual reality into their news reporting. we will have to wait and watch how the future of news reporting unfolds.
